entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
